text: Nimen yingdang yi tamen de fuqin de xingshi chenghu tamen, zai zhenzhu kan lai, zhe shi geng gongping de. Ruguo nimen bu zhidao tamen de fuqin shi shui, namo, tamen shi nimen de jiao bao he qinyou. Nimen suo wu fan de shi, duiyu nimen meiyou zuiguo, nimen suo gu fan de shi, jiu buranle. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
